title: Delight an Apple lover this holiday with this 5-piece iPhone-compatible accessory kit, now under $40
content:
Macworld

The holidays can be tough, especially when you need to gift shop for a techie. If you’re shopping for a techie, especially an Apple lover this holiday season, get them a gift they’re bound to love: this 5-piece bundle with iPhone-compatible charging accessories. Now through November 9th, this accessories kit is only $39.97 (reg. $129)!

Enjoy safety and multiple ways to power up your iPhone, whether that’s series 13, 14, or 15. With the included magnetic case, enjoy protection for your device, as well as MagSafe compatibility. It’s slim and shockproof, and designed to support wireless charging with any Qi-enabled charger.

Meanwhile, the 20W PD charging head offers auto-stop to pause charging when your iPhone is full and protection from over-charging, over-current, and over-heating. The wireless charger provides speedy charging up to 15W and 360° rotation and up to 60° bending for easy adjustments.

The portable 5,000 MAh power bank can fill up your phone wirelessly when you need it, has smart auto-off tech, and has a handy LED showing just how full everything is. Also included in this bundle is a durable USB-C charging cable that supports up to 2.4 amps of charging current.

Give an iPhone lover a holiday gift they’ll use now and beyond with this 5-Piece iPhone-Compatible Accessory Bundle, now just $39.97 through November 9th at 11:59pm PT. No coupon required!

 

5-Piece Apple Compatible Accessory Bundle

Only $39.97 through MacWorld

Prices subject to change.

Accessories
